channel.title: Fusion360 on Aum's blogging site
channel.description: Recent content in Fusion360 on Aum's blogging site

item.title: Autodesk Fusion and CAM
item.description: Autodesk Fusion and CAM Introduction Fusion 360 is a computer aided design (CAD) and computer aided manufacturing (CAM) software developed by Autodesk. Significance of G and M codes G and M codes are the most common codes used in CNC machines. G codes are used to control the movement of the machine and M codes are used to control the machine’s functions. Using Fusion for CAM Open fusion and create a new design.
